text: At 8 PM, we'll be at {link} to mingle after the rehearsal dinner.  Please stop by for a drink if you're in the area!

3 PM - Ceremony begins.  It's going to be a beautiful night, we found something FUN to do.
3:30 PM - Cocktail Hour with the Neelys begins.
5 PM - Taco bout a party!  Dinner is served, then it's time to start serving on the dance floor.

text: 10 PM - You don't have to go home, but you can't stay here.  Meet us at {link} to keep the party going!
Saturday, 5/13 - So long, and thanks for all the fish!
9 AM - Farewell breakfast.  Join us at {link} in the hotel for a cuppa joe if you have time.  Thank you for celebrating with us - we're heading back to DisneyLand tomorrow!
